about.title: About
about.subtitle: A quick look at who I am and what I do.

intro.headline: Get to know me
intro.greeting: Thanks for checking out my personal site.
intro.bio1: I'm a Software Engineer focused on Frontend work, with a little over two years of hands-on experience. I build fast, responsive web apps using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I put a lot of attention into performance, accessibility, and overall usability.
intro.bio2: I got into web development through a mix of design curiosity and wanting to understand how products work. I believe good software should make things easier, not more complicated. I try to stay close to modern tooling and best practices so what I ship holds up over time.
intro.bio3: When I work on something I don't just write code. I look at the actual problem, the business goal, and how people will use it. A good product should solve something clearly and efficiently, not just look nice.
intro.bio4: Outside of coding I spend time on UI/UX and software architecture. That helps me build products that are maintainable, not just "done for now." I also like sharing what I learn and contributing when I can.
intro.bio5: I'm always open to new projects and collaboration. If you want to build something or just talk tech, feel free to reach out. Let's build something useful.
